CHAT.comment: INV enters the room with Robodog.
child goes over to Robodog.
Robodog does not respond so child gives mom a confused look.
mom and child talk to robodog.
child picks up Robodog and puts it in middle of room.
child is referring to robodog's eye color.
robodog goes to sit and then stand up again.
mom goes onto floor to see what child is talking about.
mom puts hand in front of Robodog's face.
Robodog stops moving and shakes head.
mom puts Robodog across room and waits for it to start moving.
child holds hand up in front of Robodog.
Robodog runs into child's hand and starts to back up.
child tries to bend Robodog's head back.
child tries to bend head back again.
child starts to say something but then robodog starts up again, so she talks to it.
child bends Robodog's tail up and it starts to walk.
child tries to get robodog to walk under couch.
child kisses Robodog's head.
INV takes Robodog from room
child dances and laughs while looking in the mirror.
INV and child uncover fish tank
INV leaves the room.
mom moves over to fish tank.
mom looks through side of fish tank.
child looks through side of cage.
child walks over to mirror under camera.
mom points to back of fish tank.
mom points to thermometer.
mom gives child a hi five.
child and mom move away from fish tank.
child starts walking in a circle and mom laughs.
child moves back over to fish tank.
mom and child nod head yes.
INV covers fish tank.
INV brings toy car into room.
mom moves to floor to play with car.
mom drives car back and forth to make tires squeak and then child does the same.
child flips the car over and then mom does it.
mom flips the car over.
child flips the car over.
mom goes to take car from child but she moves away.
child rolls car to mom who flips it and makes child laugh.
child takes car from mom and rolls it across table.
INV takes car from room.
child nods her head yes and goes over to computer box.
INV and child uncover computer box.
child stands by computer box for a while and it makes noises and eventually mom comes over to check it out.
child shakes head no and mom does the same.
child and mom wave their hands over computer box and mom laughs.
computer box beeps.
computer box beeps before child touches top sensor.
mom laughs.
mom keeps touching computer box and it makes different noises.
child goes to sit over on couch.
child moves over toward table.
mom picks child up and brings her over toward microphone.
mom and child return to computer box.
INV covers computer box.
child jumps up and down.
INV brings degu into room.
child moves over to table.
mom moves over to table.
child points to top of cage.
child motions to divider on top of cage.
child points to computer box.
child looks towards observation room.
child holds her hand above cage.
INV takes degu from room.
INV brings meerkat into room.
mom goes over to couch and folds coat up and child puts meerkat on it.
child takes mom's wallet out of purse.
mom puts purse on child's shoulder.
mom takes purse off of child.
child brings meerkat under table.
child brings meerkat over to couch and mom puts it behind her back.
mom pulls it out and reads the tag.
INV takes meerkat from room.
